title: Charley Trippi, Versatile Football Hall of Famer, Dies at 100
description: A star on offense and defense, he took Georgia to a Rose Bowl victory and the Chicago Cardinals to an N.F.L. title. “The greatest football player I’ve ever seen,” Jim Thorpe said.
dc:creator: Richard Goldstein
media:description: Charley Trippi in 1953, when he played for the Chicago Cardinals. He was elected to the College Football Hall of Fame in 1959 and to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1968.
